trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for storing serialization data for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService" />.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore> class is an implementation-specific class that stores serialization data for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService>.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore> est une classe spécifique à l’implémentation qui stocke les données de sérialisation pour le <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService>.

trans-unit.source: The service adds state to this serialization store.
trans-unit.target: Le service ajoute un état à ce magasin de sérialisation.

trans-unit.source: Once the store is closed, it can be saved to a stream.
trans-unit.target: Une fois que le magasin est fermé, il peut être enregistré dans un flux.

trans-unit.source: A serialization store can be deserialized at a later time by the same type of serialization service.
trans-unit.target: Un magasin de sérialisation peut être désérialisé ultérieurement par le même type de service de sérialisation.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore> class implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface so that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> simply calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore> la classe implémente le <xref:System.IDisposable> interface afin que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> appelle simplement la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Close%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore" /> class.
Closes the serialization store.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Close%2A> method closes this store and prevents any objects from being serialized into it.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Close%2A> méthode ferme ce magasin et empêche tout objet d’y être sérialisé.

trans-unit.source: Once closed, the serialization store may be saved.
trans-unit.target: Une fois fermée, le magasin de sérialisation peut-être être enregistré.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode est appelée par le public `Dispose()` (méthode) et le <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` appelle la méthode protégée `Dispose(Boolean)` méthode avec la `disposing` paramètre la valeur `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque le `disposing` paramètre a la valeur true, cette méthode libère toutes les ressources détenues par les objets managés référencés par ce <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore> références.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode appelle la méthode `Dispose()` de chaque objet référencé.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> peut être appelée plusieurs fois par d'autres objets.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Lors de la substitution <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> veillez à ne pas référencer des objets qui ont été supprimés lors d’un appel précédent à <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur l’implémentation <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consultez [implémentant une méthode de suppression](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur <see langword="Dispose" /> et <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consultez [de nettoyage des ressources non managées](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) et [substitution de la méthode Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of errors that occurred during serialization or deserialization.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains errors that occurred during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> qui contient les erreurs qui se sont produites pendant la sérialisation ou la désérialisation.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which the store will be serialized.
Saves the store to the given stream.
If the store is open, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save%2A> method will automatically close it for you.
trans-unit.target: Si le magasin est ouvert, la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save%2A> méthode ferme automatiquement pour vous.

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save%2A> as many times as you wish to save the store to different streams.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez appeler <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save%2A> autant de fois que vous souhaitez enregistrer le magasin dans différents flux.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore" />.
